index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to community and economic development and job creation in the Central Area; authorizing and providing for the issuance of notes for the purpose of financing a loan for the expansion of Promenade 23 Shopping Center; authorizing a Funding Approval/Agreement and Contract for Loan Guarantee Assistance with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development ("HUD") for a Section 108 loan guaranty whereby HUD guarantees repayment of the notes; authorizing related agreements; creating a special fund; and appropriating the proceeds of the notes.
